name: Honey Combs
description: You can make Resident Bees produce Honey Combs with Honey. You can use Honey Combs as Temporary Armor. With your Ternary while not crouching you can make Resident Bees produce Honey Combs from Honey and you can use your Ternary while crouching and holding Honey Combs will let you consume it to use as Temporary Armor.
